abstract: Baseball Roundup; Major League Baseball is weighing whether slide that ended New York Mets shortstop Ruben Tejada’s season will be outlawed next season; other MLB news noted.
lead_paragraph: The organization is weighing whether the slide that wiped out Mets shortstop Ruben Tejada’s season will be outlawed.

headline.main: M.L.B. Considers Adjusting Rules on Slides and Replays
headline.print_headline: M.L.B. Weighs Adjusting Rules on Slides and Replays

snippet: The organization is weighing whether the slide that wiped out Mets shortstop Ruben Tejada’s season will be outlawed.
